body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Express. My name is Randy Wilson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rebecca. Can you provide me with your phone number, one zero two zero five three four nine six eight seven? And also, could you please share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is one zero two zero five three four nine six eight seven, and my email address is rebecca.martin@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Rebecca. It seems like you're feeling confused about the shipping process. Is that correct?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm not sure how the shipping works with your company.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Rebecca. Let me clarify the shipping process for you. We partner with trusted carriers to ensure that your vehicle arrives safely and on time.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's reassuring to know. Thank you for explaining.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rebecca. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us. Thank you for your time.
